frontend_featuresPremium_List04.message: Överkomligt pris. Framtida Premium-uppdateringar ingår kostnadsfritt.
frontend_featuresPremium_List04.original: Future Premium updates included without additional cost.
frontend_featuresPremium_List04.translated-from: Future Premium updates included for free.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.message: Om kortkommandot inte fungerar, kontrollera att det inte redan används av något annat tillägg eller program.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.original: It is common that there are conflicts between the keyboard shortcuts of different extensions and programs. If a shortcut key does not work, please make sure that it is not already configured for something else.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.translated-from: If the shortcut key does not work, please check that it is not already in use by another extension or program.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsHeading.message: Försök läsa upp långa texter utan pauser
frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsHeading.translated-from: Try to read long texts without pauses

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsLabel.message: Läs upp långa texter utan pauser (experimentellt)
